mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(noticeNum, userId, subject, noticeWhether, content) VALUES (#{noticeNum}, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{noticeWhether}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM notice n JOIN memberInfo m ON n.userId=m.userId
SELECT noticeNum, n.userId, nickName, subject, views, DATE_FORMAT(n.created, '%Y-%m-%d') created FROM notice n JOIN memberInfo m ON n.userId=m.userId WHERE noticeWhether=1 ORDER BY noticeNum DESC

SELECT noticeNum, n.userId, nickName, subject, views, n.created FROM notice n JOIN memberInfo m ON n.userId=m.userId
ORDER BY noticeNum DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{rows}
SELECT noticeNum, n.userId, nickName, subject, content, views, n.created FROM notice n JOIN memberInfo m ON n.userId=m.userId WHERE noticeNum=#{noticeNum}

SELECT noticeNum, subject FROM notice n JOIN memberInfo m ON n.userId=m.userId
AND (noticeNum > #{noticeNum})
ORDER BY noticeNum ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT noticeNum, subject FROM notice n JOIN memberInfo m ON n.userId=m.userId
AND (noticeNum < #{noticeNum})
ORDER BY noticeNum DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET views=views+1 WHERE noticeNum=#{noticeNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO noticeFile(noticeNum, saveFilename, originalFilename, fileSize) VALUES (#{noticeNum}, #{saveFilename}, #{originalFilename}, #{fileSize})
